title: How to Meditate — Korwitts Chiropractic Center
author: Amanda Kaplan
description: Learn how to meditate and the benefits of meditation
cleaned_text: Five Minutes to Bliss: All About Meditation Imagine closing your eyes and drifting off into pure bliss. Your mind is filled with nothing and your body feels as though it's floating. Sounds pretty great, right? According to the meditation and mindfulness app, Headspace, meditation is about training in awareness and "getting a healthy sense of perspective." When life starts to become chaotic, it's easy to fall into the trap of having negative thoughts consume you. Meditation, however, is a practice that allows you to feel mindful and understand your thoughts without harsh judgment. Meditation only takes five minutes to do and offers an abundance of benefits: awareness, clarity, and a sense of calm. According to researchers from John Hopkins University, general meditation can help with depression, anxiety, and stress. However, achieving full clarity and a sense of calm doesn't always happen the first time you meditate; it can take several meditation sessions to feel worry-free and understand your emotions better. Interested in trying out meditation for yourself? Here's a quick five-minute video that will guide you through meditation.
